attributes.action: For the right to use the toilet at anytime in the school day
attributes.additional_details: We would like this right as it is already a right for people, but not in school at the moment. Personally when i asked to use the toilet and was denied permission, i asked why and the teacher told me off. I want to change that
attributes.background: Give students in any school all over the UK to be able to use the toilet in school time (including lessons) without being questioned or denied access.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions on policies regarding when students can leave the classroom are a matter for individual schools and teachers, not the UK Government or House of Commons.

If you are unhappy with how your school or teacher deals with requests to use the toilet, you should raise this with your school or parents.
